originalTranscription: I am already running across rooftops at night. The city is wet with rain and neon lights reflect off concrete. I vault railings, slide under obstacles, and leap impossible gaps without thinking. Something unseen is chasing me, pushing me faster as the city reshapes itself into narrow corridors. Rain intensifies and steam rises as I wall-run, grab ledges at the last second, and keep moving. I am not scared, only focused and capable.
summary: The dream centers on a fast-paced nighttime parkour chase across rooftops, where an unseen pursuer drives constant motion. The emphasis is on fluid movement, heightened ability, and confidence rather than fear.

scenes.text: The dream opens mid-run on rain-slick rooftops under neon city lights, with the dreamer instinctively vaulting railings and leaping wide gaps as the environment feels alive and responsive to movement.

As the chase continues, the city narrows into corridors and obstacles increase, but the dreamer executes wall-runs, slides, and last-second grabs effortlessly, feeling capable and focused despite the unseen pursuer.

fragments: The sensation that the body knows exactly what to do without conscious thought.
Rain and steam amplifying the glow of the city below.
